Class playn.core.Color

Added Methods
float decodeLower(float) Decodes and returns the lower color value in a two color value encoded by .encode.
float decodeUpper(float) Decodes and returns the upper color value in a two color value encoded by .encode.
float encode(float, float) Encodes two [0..1] color values into the format used by the standard shader program.
